item.description:
We are happy to have Debra Stevens from The Stevens Group present the ABCs of commercial real estate as a part of the Revolve Nation Seminar series. This is a great primer/refresher for anyone that is currrently in a commercial space, looking to move into one, or looking to relocate.

Come to the seminar and learn the following:
--Office/Flex/Lab/Industrial? What is the difference? What space do YOU need? How to Measure Commercial Space? How is Rent Quoted? How to compare propoerties on an Apples to Apples basis?
--What are the most important factors when choosing a new location?
--How to decide to stay where you are and expand & extend; or move to another newer location?
--What are the most important clauses in the Lease/

If you have yet to lease a space for your business, come learn how!

If you have leased a space for your business, whether you have done 2 moves or 20 relocations, come and get a "refresher". Space is limited so RSVP today. We are looking forward to seeing you there!

group.name: Revolve Nation: Boston's Green and Sustainable Business Grp

item.name: ABCs of Commercial Real Estate
